headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Double Rewards in Rhino Hunt
content: In Rhino Hunt, pursuers in off-road vehicles are armed with nothing but Sticky Bombs and their wits; the hunted, meanwhile, are protected by the armored plating of their tank, and must survive for three minutes. And no matter who is victorious, both sides will walk away with double the usual GTA$ and RP, all week long.
